stories.title: Delete RACING GAME-features-car-model-variant Relationship
stories.userStory:
As an API contributor
I want to be able to disconnect CAR MODEL VARIANTS from RACING GAMES
So I can clean up bad data or test data
specificationList: The ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship is deleted when it actually exists. -> Status Code `204`
A successful request returns with an empty body.
Requests with invalid IDs are rejected. This can happen when there exist no nodes with the given IDs or when those nodes are from the wrong type. -> Status Code `404`
Requests are rejected when there exists no ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship between the provided nodes. -> Status Code `404`

acceptanceCriteria.title: The ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship is deleted when the provided data is valid
acceptanceCriteria.description: To be valid there need to exist nodes for the provided IDs and the first node needs to be a RACING GAME and the second node needs to be a CAR MODEL VARIANT.

tests.title: Deleting the ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship when it actually exists
tests.gherkin:
Given there exists a "RACING GAME" "F1 2025"
And there exists a "CAR MODEL VARIANT" "Toyota Yaris"
And there exists a "features car model variant" relationship "R" between "F1 2025" and "Toyota Yaris"
When the user deletes the "features car model variant" relationship between "F1 2025" and "Toyota Yaris"
Then the request should be confirmed with status code 204
And the relationship "R" should not exist anymore

acceptanceCriteria.title: Requests to delete the ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship are rejected when the provided data is invalid
acceptanceCriteria.description:
There exists no RACING GAME with the provided ID? -> rejected.
There exists no CAR MODEL VARIANT with the provided ID? -> rejected.

tests.title: Trying to delete a ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship with invalid RACING GAME ID

And there exists a "CAR MODEL VARIANT" "Toyota Yaris"
When the user deletes the "features car model variant" relationship between "F1 2025" and "Toyota Yaris"
Then the request should be rejected with status code 404

acceptanceCriteria.title: Requests to delete the ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship are rejected when the relationship does not exist
acceptanceCriteria.description: The relationship might have never existed or it has already been deleted. No matter the reason, an error will be returned.

tests.title: Trying to delete a non-existent ›features-car-model-variant‹ relationship

And there exists a "CAR MODEL VARIANT" "Toyota Yaris"
And there exists NO "features car model variant" relationship between "F1 2025" and "Toyota Yaris"
When the user deletes the "features car model variant" relationship between "F1 2025" and "Toyota Yaris"
